title: AI-Based Repetitive Learning Program for Advanced Mandarin Pronunciation Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic Chinese grammar and vocabulary at HSK Level 5 or higher
context.additional_context: Students primarily learn via smartphones, requiring pronunciation assessment and enhancement of self-directed learning competencies

learning_goals: Enhance the accuracy of the four tones to over 90% using an AI pronunciation evaluation system
Improve the naturalness of intonation and rhythm through repeated pronunciation practice (3 times weekly, 20+ minutes per session)

Learners analyze pronunciation error patterns of ten or more individuals using AI-based speech analysis tools (e.g., Praat, SpeechRater), and based on frequency/severity evaluations by error type, establish personalized re-practice plans (including at least three strategies).

Learners achieve ≥85% pronunciation accuracy in AI speech synthesis systems during monthly formal presentations (5-minute presentations) and daily conversation scenarios (10-minute dialogues) over six months, and earn an "excellent" grade in two out of three rubric criteria (pronunciation clarity, intonation naturalness, appropriate speed).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
